data.eml:eml: Ompok karunkodu, a new catfish (Teleostei: Siluridae) from southern India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ng, Heok Hee (2013): Ompok karunkodu, a new catfish (Teleostei: Siluridae) from southern India. Zootaxa 3694 (2): 161-166, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3694.2.5
